title: Bug 18268: Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description:
Bug 18268: The issue is that images and files located in NL-specific subdirectories are not being found. Here are the steps to reproduce the bug:

1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif.
3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini. Change the value of the aboutImage property to: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif.
4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini. Change the value of the aboutImage property to: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
5. Open the about dialog.

Observation: There is a main image again. This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but the $nl$ path segment is not being handled correctly.
EB:
Open the about dialog.

Observation: There is no main image.
Expectation: The main image should be found in nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
